body.section: Hierarchy PublishedConsent is a kind of ConsentDirective

section.title: Description
section.p: This specialization of the ConsentDirective class is used to describe a consent directive published to a registry. If a client s consent directive is published, a URL/URI is made available for reference. The client may use this URI to allow providers access to the consent directive created by the consenter.

stentry.p: If a specific consent directive (for a client) is published, this attribute provides the means to locate and download the consent directive from a registry.
